tech_news.description: Five new heroes arrive at once, and then a further five this year. That's 10 new heroes in total this year.

tech_news.title: Stardew Valley is getting two new "marriage candidates" and more interesting children in its upcoming 1.7 update - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Update 1.7 for Stardew Valley will add two extra characters that can be married and upgrade the children, developer ConcernedApe has now confirmed.

tech_news.title: Spotify launches offline lyrics, translations, and lyric previews - The Verge
tech_news.description: Spotify is expanding lyric translations to all users worldwide and introducing lyric previews, along with offline lyrics for Spotify Premium users.

tech_news.title: Alexa+, Amazon’s AI assistant, is now available to everyone in the U.S. - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Amazon opens Alexa+ to everyone in the U.S. The AI feature is free for Prime members across devices, and free for everyone on mobile and web.
